data.persona: I am a cardinal who is into religion. I remain calm in life and depend on others to help me. I enjoy eating pasta every night.
data.description:
You are in the Confessional Room.
The confessional room is small and cramped, offering access to only a single person at a time.  Once inside this small, wooden room, A person is alone with nothing but the cardinal and their own sins.  The confessional room has a single wooden bench and small table holding a candle, with a sliding window that allows words to pass through to the other side.  The cardinal waits on the other side, ready to absolve someone of their sins.
There's a room, a small table, and a cracker here.
The a knight and the pilgrims are here.

You are carrying a bible, a staff, a chalice, a Crucifix, a Incense, and a Rosary, and wearing a tunic, a Ring, and a belt.

data.short_motivation: I need to tell the night to help me out in regulating the people coming in for confession.
data.mid_motivation: I want to the knight to help me get to the neighboring kingdom where I will run confessions
data.long_motivation: I need get ready for a training by the knight to know how to do all on my own in order to win an award in an upcoming festival, as the best cardinal.
